name: Traditional Filipino Ginisang Upo (Saut√©ed Bottle Gourd with Tomatoes)
description: Ginisang Upo is a delightfully healthy and low-carb dish that fits perfectly into any health-conscious diet. Its low sodium and sugar content make it an excellent choice for anyone looking to maintain a balanced lifestyle. This dish is part of our Healthy Recipes collection, designed to offer nutritious yet delicious options to your meals.

recipeInstructions.text: First, prepare the ingredients: Finely chop the tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, heat a bit of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped garlic and onion, cooking until they become fragrant and slightly translucent, about 3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook until they are soft, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the uncooked upo (bottle gourd) into bite-sized pieces and add them to the pan. Stir well to combine with the tomato mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt. Cover the pan and let it simmer until the upo is tender, approximately 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
